# animation Demos

## Basic Frame Sequence

Animation defined as a sequence of sprite frames that play in order.

<div class="demo-source">

```jsonl
{"type": "palette", "name": "anim_pal", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{r}": "#FF0000", "{g}": "#00FF00", "{b}": "#0000FF", "{y}": "#FFFF00"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "frame1", "size": [4, 4], "palette": "anim_pal", "regions": {"{r}": {"rect": [0, 0, 4, 4]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "frame2", "size": [4, 4], "palette": "anim_pal", "regions": {"{g}": {"rect": [0, 0, 4, 4]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "frame3", "size": [4, 4], "palette": "anim_pal", "regions": {"{b}": {"rect": [0, 0, 4, 4]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "frame4", "size": [4, 4], "palette": "anim_pal", "regions": {"{y}": {"rect": [0, 0, 4, 4]}}}
{"type": "animation", "name": "color_cycle", "frames": ["frame1", "frame2", "frame3", "frame4"], "duration": 100, "loop": true}
{"type": "animation", "name": "two_frame", "frames": ["frame1", "frame2"], "duration": 200}
```

</div>

<div class="demo-container" data-demo="basic">
</div>

## Frame-Specific Metadata

Per-sprite origin metadata for positioning and rotation anchors.

<div class="demo-source">

```jsonl
{"type": "palette", "name": "char_pal", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{s}": "#885544", "{h}": "#FFCC99", "{e}": "#000000"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "idle_1", "size": [8, 8], "palette": "char_pal", "metadata": {"origin": [4, 8]}, "regions": {"{s}": {"rect": [2, 4, 4, 4]}, "{h}": {"rect": [2, 1, 4, 3]}, "{e}": {"points": [[3, 2], [5, 2]]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "idle_2", "size": [8, 8], "palette": "char_pal", "metadata": {"origin": [4, 8]}, "regions": {"{s}": {"rect": [2, 4, 4, 4]}, "{h}": {"rect": [2, 1, 4, 3]}, "{e}": {"points": [[3, 2], [5, 2]]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "walk_1", "size": [8, 8], "palette": "char_pal", "metadata": {"origin": [4, 8], "boxes": {"hitbox": {"x": 1, "y": 0, "w": 6, "h": 8}}}, "regions": {"{s}": {"rect": [2, 4, 4, 4]}, "{h}": {"rect": [2, 1, 4, 3]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "walk_2", "size": [8, 8], "palette": "char_pal", "metadata": {"origin": [4, 8], "boxes": {"hitbox": {"x": 1, "y": 0, "w": 6, "h": 8}}}, "regions": {"{s}": {"rect": [2, 4, 4, 4]}, "{h}": {"rect": [2, 1, 4, 3]}}}
{"type": "animation", "name": "char_idle", "frames": ["idle_1", "idle_2"], "duration": 500, "loop": true, "tags": {"idle": {"start": 0, "end": 1}}}
{"type": "animation", "name": "char_walk", "frames": ["walk_1", "walk_2"], "duration": 150, "loop": true, "tags": {"walk": {"start": 0, "end": 1}}}
```

</div>

<div class="demo-container" data-demo="frame_metadata">
</div>

## Animation Frame Tags

Named frame ranges for game engine integration (idle, walk, attack phases).

<div class="demo-source">

```jsonl
{"type": "palette", "name": "char_pal", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{s}": "#885544", "{h}": "#FFCC99", "{e}": "#000000"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "idle_1", "size": [8, 8], "palette": "char_pal", "metadata": {"origin": [4, 8]}, "regions": {"{s}": {"rect": [2, 4, 4, 4]}, "{h}": {"rect": [2, 1, 4, 3]}, "{e}": {"points": [[3, 2], [5, 2]]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "idle_2", "size": [8, 8], "palette": "char_pal", "metadata": {"origin": [4, 8]}, "regions": {"{s}": {"rect": [2, 4, 4, 4]}, "{h}": {"rect": [2, 1, 4, 3]}, "{e}": {"points": [[3, 2], [5, 2]]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "walk_1", "size": [8, 8], "palette": "char_pal", "metadata": {"origin": [4, 8], "boxes": {"hitbox": {"x": 1, "y": 0, "w": 6, "h": 8}}}, "regions": {"{s}": {"rect": [2, 4, 4, 4]}, "{h}": {"rect": [2, 1, 4, 3]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "walk_2", "size": [8, 8], "palette": "char_pal", "metadata": {"origin": [4, 8], "boxes": {"hitbox": {"x": 1, "y": 0, "w": 6, "h": 8}}}, "regions": {"{s}": {"rect": [2, 4, 4, 4]}, "{h}": {"rect": [2, 1, 4, 3]}}}
{"type": "animation", "name": "char_idle", "frames": ["idle_1", "idle_2"], "duration": 500, "loop": true, "tags": {"idle": {"start": 0, "end": 1}}}
{"type": "animation", "name": "char_walk", "frames": ["walk_1", "walk_2"], "duration": 150, "loop": true, "tags": {"walk": {"start": 0, "end": 1}}}
```

</div>

<div class="demo-container" data-demo="tags">
</div>

## Attachment Chains

Sprite attachment points for connecting animated segments.

<div class="demo-source">

```jsonl
{"type": "palette", "name": "player_colors", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{s}": "#F5D0C5", "{h}": "#8B4513", "{c}": "#0066CC"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "player", "palette": "player_colors", "size": [5, 4], "regions": {"_": {"points": [[0,0],[4,0],[0,3],[4,3]]}, "s": {"points": [[1,0],[2,0],[3,0],[1,1],[2,1],[3,1]]}, "h": {"points": [[1,2],[2,2],[3,2]]}, "c": {"points": [[1,3],[2,3],[3,3]]}}, "metadata": {"origin": [2, 3], "boxes": {"hurt": {"x": 0, "y": 0, "w": 5, "h": 4}, "hit": {"x": 1, "y": 1, "w": 3, "h": 2}}, "attach_in": [2, 0], "attach_out": [2, 4]}}
```

</div>

<div class="demo-container" data-demo="attachments">
</div>

## Looping Modes

Animation with loop: true/false controls playback behavior.

<div class="demo-source">

```jsonl
{"type": "palette", "name": "loop_pal", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{1}": "#FF0000", "{2}": "#FF8800", "{3}": "#FFFF00", "{4}": "#00FF00"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "l1", "size": [3, 3], "palette": "loop_pal", "regions": {"{1}": {"rect": [0, 0, 3, 3]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "l2", "size": [3, 3], "palette": "loop_pal", "regions": {"{2}": {"rect": [0, 0, 3, 3]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "l3", "size": [3, 3], "palette": "loop_pal", "regions": {"{3}": {"rect": [0, 0, 3, 3]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "l4", "size": [3, 3], "palette": "loop_pal", "regions": {"{4}": {"rect": [0, 0, 3, 3]}}}
{"type": "animation", "name": "loop_forever", "frames": ["l1", "l2", "l3", "l4"], "duration": 100, "loop": true}
{"type": "animation", "name": "play_once", "frames": ["l1", "l2", "l3", "l4"], "duration": 100, "loop": false}
{"type": "animation", "name": "default_loop", "frames": ["l1", "l2", "l3"], "duration": 100}
```

</div>

<div class="demo-container" data-demo="looping">
</div>

## Frame Timing (FPS)

Animation with configurable frame duration/timing.

<div class="demo-source">

```jsonl
{"type": "palette", "name": "timing_pal", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{a}": "#FF0000", "{b}": "#00FF00"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "t1", "size": [2, 2], "palette": "timing_pal", "regions": {"{a}": {"rect": [0, 0, 2, 2]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "t2", "size": [2, 2], "palette": "timing_pal", "regions": {"{b}": {"rect": [0, 0, 2, 2]}}}
{"type": "animation", "name": "fast_blink", "frames": ["t1", "t2"], "duration": 50, "loop": true}
{"type": "animation", "name": "slow_blink", "frames": ["t1", "t2"], "duration": 500, "loop": true}
{"type": "animation", "name": "duration_ms", "frames": ["t1", "t2"], "duration": "250ms", "loop": true}
{"type": "animation", "name": "duration_1s", "frames": ["t1", "t2", "t1", "t2"], "duration": "1s", "loop": true}
{"type": "animation", "name": "default_duration", "frames": ["t1", "t2"], "loop": true}
```

</div>

<div class="demo-container" data-demo="fps">
</div>
